title: Economic Knowledge Graph Linker
reason: We need this skill because missions need explicit tradeoff logic for cost, speed, and impact. This specific skill connects fragmented facts into reusable structures.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Economic Knowledge Graph Linker`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to overspending and low-impact allocation.
Design and version the input/output contract for budgets, costs, benefits, and opportunity values, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using entity and relation linking, and produce linked knowledge entities with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover overspending and low-impact allocation, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.

traceability.scopeStep: Define the scope and success metrics for `Economic Knowledge Graph Linker`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to overspending and low-impact allocation.
traceability.contractStep: Design and version the input/output contract for budgets, costs, benefits, and opportunity values, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
traceability.coreStep: Implement the core capability using entity and relation linking, and produce linked knowledge entities with deterministic scoring.
traceability.orchestrationStep: Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
traceability.validationStep: Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover overspending and low-impact allocation, then run regression baselines.
traceability.rolloutStep: Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
